CVE-2003-0792.title: Fetchmail 6.2.5 fixes a remote DoS â€” GLSA 200403-10
CVE-2003-0792.subTitle: Fetchmail versions 6.2.4 and earlier can be crashed by sending a specially-crafted email to a fetchmail user.
CVE-2003-0792.background: Fetchmail is a utility that retrieves and forwards mail from remote systems using IMAP, POP, and other protocols.
CVE-2003-0792.body: Fetchmail versions 6.2.4 and earlier can be crashed by sending a specially-crafted email to a fetchmail user. This problem occurs because Fetchmail does not properly allocate memory for long lines in an incoming email.
CVE-2003-0792.extra: Fetchmail users who receive a malicious email may have their fetchmail program crash.
